name: Anna
short_description: Hi, I am Anna Front-End Developer. I primarily focus on writing clean, elegant, and efficient code. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript,jQuery,Vue(2,3 and Nuxt). I also review existing code and can consult with you on how to improve it.
description: Hi, I am Anna Front-End Developer. I primarily focus on writing clean, elegant, and efficient code. I am proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript,jQuery,Vue(2,3 and Nuxt). I also review existing code and can consult with you on how to improve it. I have been Front-End for three years, of which i spent a year HTML coding(HTML,SCSS,jQuery) and two years Vue.js Development

education.title: Yerevan State Basic Medical College
education.description: I studied in Yerevan State Basic Medical College as a pharmacist

education.title: Yerevan State University
education.description: I studied in Yerevan State University as a Information Technologies Educational and Research Centre

education.title: BeeOnCode
education.description: Web Development (Html, Css, JavaScript, jQuery, Php

education.title: ToCode Academy
education.description: Vue js, Vue 2, Vue 3, VueX, Vue-Router, VueX

education.title: SkillBox
education.description: Profession Frontend developer from scratch to PRO
